data.event: A petition from the residents of the barrio for the creation of a new town was presented on September 15, 1819.
It was proclaimed a new town by Governor General Don Mariano Fern√°ndez de Folgueras on January 18, 1820, and was originally named "Magdalena de Ambling".
They first established a makeshift school in 1820, which was the very first requirement for it to be a town.

event.title: the construction of a church in 1829

data.event: A small chapel was also constructed and it gave way to the construction of a church in 1829.
The construction of the concrete town hall and the church convent started in 1871, and was finished in 1884.
The construction of the concrete town hall and the church convent started in 1871, and was finished in 1884.
